long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Ad Library - Insight into the market pulse, leading the new trend of ad! As the elite reconnaissance assistant of TikTok ad library and LinkedIn ad library, let you easily grasp the trend of the ad market!

Main functions:
ğŸ¯ Real-time monitoring of competing product ad data, revealing competing product ad and marketing strategies, allowing you to proceed step by step.
ğŸ”¥ More than 600,000 + ad materials have been collected. Not only can the latest cross-platform ad content be directly saved in the ad library, but also one-click jumping can collect ad materials from various platforms of the system, injecting fresh blood into the personal ad library.
ğŸ” Multi-dimensional filtering, customize ad search criteria according to needs, such as ad group, ad activity details, ad release date, ad copy and ad status, etc., for precise targeting.
ğŸ’¼ Conveniently save ad as personal favorites for viewing and learning anytime, anywhere.
ğŸ’¡ Quickly capture the highlights of competitors' ad creativity and inspire your ad creativity.

Say goodbye to the annoyance of lacking rich filters in ad libraries on various platforms. The ad library helps you make ad research efficient and easy. Activate the ad library function, easily lock potential viral ad products, and add them to your exclusive ad collection with one click.
adLibrary not only provides real-time ad data, but also deeply mines ad history, becoming a powerful assistant for you to explore the ad market and discover ad business opportunities, leading you to the road to success!
